entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Kluane Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:00 a.m. MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023
